item.title: The SIEMingly Amazing Honeypot
item.description: A Sweet Solution to a Sour Problem At the beginning of 2021, I began my journey into the world of technology, more specifically, cyber security. Whenever I ran into a technology-based issue in my home, I always saw Cyber Security/Computer Science had the solution to it, which I always found very inspiring. This was one of the many reasons I found myself looking toward this career path. An example issue I experienced was a bombardment of advertisements on websites I commonly visited (the majority being malicious.
